languages.text: "Я усердно служил в планетарных силах, Ваша Светлость. Даже получил медаль от губернатора Драйвстема за оборону южного улья от ксеносов. И пусть я рожден на мире, скованном гравитацией, мое сердце принадлежит пустоте!"

traits.locale_text: "Я усердно служил планетарным силам Даргонуса, Ваша Светлость. Даже получил наградную медаль из рук губернатора Драйвстема за оборону южного улья во время нападения врагов Человечества. И пусть я рожден на мире, скованном гравитацией, мое сердце всегда будет принадлежать пустоте!"

languages.text: "I have served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against the xenos. I may have been born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"
languages.original_text: "Я усердно служил в планетарных силах, Ваша Светлость. Даже получил медаль от губернатора Драйвстема за оборону южного улья от ксеносов. И пусть я рожден на мире, скованном гравитацией, мое сердце принадлежит пустоте!"

traits.locale_text: "I served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I even received a medal from Governor Drivestem for defending the southern hive against xenos. And though I was born on a gravity-bound world, my heart belongs to the void!"

"I served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I even received a medal from Governor Drivestem for defending the southern hive against xenos. And though I was born on a gravity-bound world, my heart belongs to the void!"

"I served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against xenos. And I may have born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"

"I served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against xenos. And I may have born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"

"I have served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against the xenos. I may have been born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"

"I have served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against the xenos. I may have been born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"

languages.text: « J'ai servi dans les forces planétaires, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai même reçu une médaille d'honneur des mains du gouverneur Drivestem pour avoir défendu la ruche sud contre les xénos. Je suis peut-être né sur un monde où la gravité fait loi, mais mon cœur appartient au vide ! »
languages.original_text: "I have served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against the xenos. I may have been born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai servi dans les forces planétaires, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai même reçu une médaille d'honneur des mains du gouverneur Drivestem pour avoir défendu la ruche sud contre les xénos. Je suis peut-être né sur un monde où la gravité fait loi, mais mon cœur appartient au vide ! »

languages.text: «He servido fielmente en las fuerzas planetarias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Hasta recibí una condecoración del Gobernador Drivestem por proteger la colmena meridional contra los xenos. Habré nacido en la gravedad de un planeta, ¡pero mi corazón está en el vacío!».
languages.original_text: "I have served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against the xenos. I may have been born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"

traits.locale_text: «He servido fielmente en las fuerzas planetarias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Hasta recibí una condecoración del Gobernador Drivestem por proteger la colmena meridional contra los xenos. Habré nacido en la gravedad de un planeta, ¡pero mi corazón está en el vacío!».

languages.text: 「私は惑星軍に真面目に仕えてきました、陛下。異種族から南のハイブを防衛したことで、ドライブステム総督から勲章を受け取ったくらいです。重力に縛られた惑星で生まれたかもしれませんが、心は虚空にあります！」
languages.original_text: "I have served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against the xenos. I may have been born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は惑星軍に真面目に仕えてきました、陛下。異種族から南のハイブを防衛したことで、ドライブステム総督から勲章を受け取ったくらいです。重力に縛られた惑星で生まれたかもしれませんが、心は虚空にあります！」

languages.text: “我在行星卫队服役，尽忠职守，大人。我守护住了南部巢都，击退了来袭的异形，德莱夫斯塔总督甚至给我颁发了一枚奖章。或许我出生在受重力束缚的世界，但我的心却属于虚空！”
languages.original_text: "I have served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against the xenos. I may have been born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"

traits.locale_text: “我在行星卫队服役，尽忠职守，大人。我守护住了南部巢都，击退了来袭的异形，德莱夫斯塔总督甚至给我颁发了一枚奖章。或许我出生在受重力束缚的世界，但我的心却属于虚空！”

languages.text: "Ich habe pflichtbewusst bei den planetaren Streitkräften gedient, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Gouverneur Drivestem hat mir sogar eine Medaille für die Verteidigung der südlichen Makropole gegen die Xenos verliehen. Ich mag auf einer Welt mit Gravitation geboren worden sein, aber mein Herz gehört der Leere!"
languages.original_text: "I have served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against the xenos. I may have been born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe pflichtbewusst bei den planetaren Streitkräften gedient, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Gouverneur Drivestem hat mir sogar eine Medaille für die Verteidigung der südlichen Makropole gegen die Xenos verliehen. Ich mag auf einer Welt mit Gravitation geboren worden sein, aber mein Herz gehört der Leere!"

languages.text: "Gezegen kuvvetlerinde görevime sadık bir şekilde hizmet ettim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Hatta Vali Drivestem, zenolara karşı güney kovanını savunmamdan dolayı beni bir madalyayla ödüllendirdi. Yer çekimine bağlı bir dünyada doğmuş olsam da yüreğim uçsuza ait!"
languages.original_text: "I have served dutifully in the planetary forces, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem even awarded me a medal for defending the southern hive against the xenos. I may have been born on a gravity-bound world, but my heart belongs to the void!"
